title: BBQ with Bobby Flay - S01E03 - Austin Texas
description:
BBQ with Bobby Flay - S01E03 - Austin Texas

Bobby Flay is a critically acclaimed chef, restaurateur, award-winning cookbook author and television personality.

About the Show

Chef and grilling star Bobby Flay travels the country in search of all that is grilled, smoked, barbecued and enjoyed. Join him as he meets colorful characters, visits undiscovered BBQ joints and tries every grilling gadget imaginable. From ribs in Memphis and salmon in Alaska to the world's biggest BBQ cook-off, he'll discover all the foods and flavors that make BBQ one of America's favorite cooking styles and backyard pastimes.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

If it's good enough for the White House, is it good enough your house? Try the President's favorite BBQ. Join a party marking the end of slavery and the beginning of a BBQ tradition, and at a Honky Tonk, you don't have to choose between the brisket and the band.
Recipes in This Episode

    * Rib-eye Steak
    * Roasted Corn and Green Relish
    * Texas Hash
    * Grilled Bartlett Pears A La Mode
    * Broken Spoke BBQ Brisket
    * Cooper's Pork Ribs
